plot: The rise and fall of the ocean tide reflect the fleeting nature of youth, as a young man remembers the night that changed his life.
title: September Tide
plot_es: The rise and fall of the ocean tide reflect the fleeting nature of youth, as a young man remembers the night that changed his life.
plot_en: The rise and fall of the ocean tide reflect the fleeting nature of youth, as a young man remembers the night that changed his life.
